website_summaries.verdict: This gel does a good job holding curls in humid climates without an unpleasant feel or scent. However, it may disappoint if your curls are tight or coiled.
pros: A little bit of this gel goes a long way to control frizz and keep curls looking great in most humid conditions
Doesn't leave hair feeling stiff or crunchy
Contains a silk protein that locks in moisture
Has a nice scent, and doesn't contain parabens, phthalates, or silicone
cons: Works best on loose curls compared to tight coils
You may need to re-apply it throughout the day if it's very humid

customer_reviews.title: No caption needed..!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously no caption needed. My second time buying this stuff and I LOVE it. Defines curles and doesn’t make your hair “crunchy” at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used to love this gel use it every day and then I ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this gel use it every day and then I read the reviews that the formula was change but I thought I’d give it a try and it’s terrible your hair is very crunchy and it’s not soft at all like you used to be with the older for more I’m so mad because now I have to find another gel and this gel works for me for years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE solution for curly hair with lasting curls and no frizz
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product by asking a cashier at a store how she kept her very wavy hair so beautiful without frizz on a humid windy day. She happened to have a sample of this product in her purse and she gave it to me. Wow. This is better "gel" than I have every used on my own very wavy hair. You just apply it to your hair after washing, air dry, and then all you have to do to refresh your curls or waves for days afterward is just spritz with water and finger-comb your hair into place. Just an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Formula change??
customer_reviews.text: I think they changed this formula. It used to make my hair soft and the curls more defined. Now it is sticky and makes my hair crunchy and the curls are not very defined. Not sure I will buy another bottle of this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that can keep the frizz out of my hair even if crazy humidity. I've been using it for a couple of years now and haven't seen any difference in formulation. The only time it's ever been crunchy is when I've used too much or haven't distributed it well, otherwise it pulls curls together and my hair isn't weighed down, sticky, or stiff. Ouidad also doesn't do animal testing, which is a big plus. I won't use anything else on this crazy mop of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Flip cap missing!!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box my order came in. Everything was ok, except the flip top on the Ouidad Heat & Humidity Gel was missing!! And nowhere to be found in the box!! I have never used this product before and was so excited to, especially after seeing that it was an "Amazon Choice" product. The fact that it was even sold by Amazon made me think that I'd have no trouble with it. Guess I was wrong! Now I have to find a way to keep the top closed so it doesn't spill and/or stuff doesn't get in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for curly, difficult hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very curly difficult hair and this stuff works better than anything else I've ever tried to keep it manageable--especially here in humid Florida!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Frizzy hair frizzy hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like I stuck my finger in a socket. I think there is actually less curl lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best styling product!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite hair products. In fact, it's the only styling product I use. I put it on my hair when it's dripping wet, still in the shower, then I wrap my head in an old t shirt for several minutes. It creates the nicest defined waves! I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: lucypevensie

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was glycerin free. When I used it, it dried out my hair and made it sticky. Upon examination of the ingredients, I found the second ingredient is a glycol. This is a humectant! If you are looking for a glycerin-free product, also look for other humectants as well. It took several washes and a clarifying shampoo to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: This Product Does Not Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I like the clean scent and the texture of the product is great but it just does not seem to work for my wavy hair in the high humidity of Georgia. It goes onto my hair and makes it crunchy and that's it. If I wanted crunchy hair, I would use cheap gel. This item is way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not just for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: I know this is advertised for curly hair but I've used it for two years. I have fine straight hair that needs volume and it works great for adding volume and keeping fine hair from going frizzy with humidity. It takes a very small amount applied to damp hair to improve volume and keep waves looking smooth all day. A bottle may seem expensive but a bottle lasts me almost a year (I have short hair). Less expensive and more effective than cheaper styling gels.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Frizz-free hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2A 2B curly hair and spent my life looking for ways to manage frizz. On rainy days, I used to say “stand back everybody, I don’t know how big my hair is going to get!” Then, I discovered Advanced Climate Control in NYC while working there for almost two years. NY humidity was much more than I was used to and I just kept trying products looking for help. I add this to my “Curly Girl” routine as the last product when wet and it is terrific. I spent a rainy weekend trip with my curls intact and frizz free as a result. Great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KMR

customer_reviews.title: Best gel I’ve found for my thick coarse frizzy/curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: This gel is fantastic! I’ve been fighting my thick coarse frizzy curly hair all my life. This gel makes it soft, shiny, and controls the frizz. I wash my hair every 6 days. I need to refresh my curls every other day with it. Sometimes I can just spray my hair with water and maybe once in between I need to also use a bit more gel. I am going to try the stronger version to see if i could refresh even less often. As recommended you should also use a good leave-in conditioner before using the gel. It also smells good. I have no complaints except it is a bit pricey but it’s worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cause of the reviews I saw on youtube. The reviews I read on the product page were good. Only now do I see that they changed the formula and now is not a good product. This gave me product build up, did not control frizz, has a crunch, and totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My curls are reborn!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southern Florida and have a frizzy mess every day. Thought I needed a trim or maybe too much damage done to my hair as the reason why I lost my curls. I used this for the first time today, let it air dry, even went outside in the sweltering heat. And wow! It’s a miracle!!!
customer_reviews.author: krysten t balfe

customer_reviews.title: Best curl gel around!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Been using it for about a month and my curls have never looked better. At first your hair is crunchy but you just have "break the mold" but scrunching it up a bit after drying. I've read many a curl blog and if you use the techniques they really do work well. This is my new go to for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my frizzy 3c curls
customer_reviews.text: I'm a native New Yorker and I used Ouidad's (less expensive) Tress F/X Gel for 12 YEARS. They recently changed the formula and it left my curls stringy, greasy and frizzy all at the same time. So I caved and bought this gel. Works great. I get soft, shiny curls with a little but of crunch that I scrunch out. Good hold. BTW, I've tried both this and the stronger hold Climate gel and they seem to be the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Summer Gel
customer_reviews.text: I have used Ouidad products on and off throughout my curl journey. I will start by saying I am a 3B curl, thin but with medium to high density. I like a gel that holds my 3B curls and makes it last a few days. I must stay many complain about the hold being hard- I say just use less gel. I can control the stiffness by the amount of gel I put in my hair. Nothing works better than this for southern humid summer days and even survives outside workouts! Give it a try you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: JCN

customer_reviews.title: perfect control
customer_reviews.text: A friend with very kinky hair recommended this product to me and I tried it. I love it too. I put it in my hair after washing and rinsing shampoo and conditioner. Adding a quarter size dollop, I rub through hair and separate my hair into maybe about 10 sections and pull the sections straight. I rarely blow dry my hair or use a straighter so this technique seems to calm my curls down, leaving it wavy not kinky.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on reviews. Disappointed not different than products I have been using.
customer_reviews.author: cristine durham

customer_reviews.title: Good Hair Control
customer_reviews.text: I have very curly hair and use this to keep the curls in check especially with the humid FL weather. I like this product because it seems to help detangle my hair too and leave it feeling smooth, unlike other products that have alcohol in them. I couple this with the Ouidad curling cream.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Shields

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be. The new formula sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for the past nine years, but I’ve noticed that they changed the formula and the product isn’t as good as it was before. I’m deeply disappointed. Looking for a new GOOD product since this one has passed it's prime.
customer_reviews.author: Photoaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT hold Curly Hair
customer_reviews.text: The weather doesn't matter, it won't hold my loose curls that tend to become fuzzy by day's end, even though I work inside. This product does NOT hold the hair that is smoothed down on top of my head when pulled into ponytail. Pantene Sculpting Curl Gel in 6.8 oz. tube DOES and beats this, hands down, at about $5 a tube.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Saved my frizzy waves from summer!
customer_reviews.text: New to this brand. Needed something for my waves in humid summer season. This was recommended by friend who has incredible curls. Love it. Put on wet with some sea salt spray and plop in tshirt towel. My hair even curls at the roots! Minimal styling needed. Stays frizz free all day. I can't wait to try other products.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWorldwide

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good gel but the hold isn’t great. The frizz control isn’t great. I have semi curly mixture hair some areas curlier than other area and fizzy hair so having a stronger hold helps blending and control. This gel is for more curlier hair with less control and flexibility because it isn’t needed. Not for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Product
customer_reviews.text: Have fine wavy hair that will frizz in humid weather. Wash hair, put this if, scrunch my hair with a towel. Can dry with diffuser or air dry. No frizz. Have light curls/wavy hair. Next day just mist and re-scrunch and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: No more frizz
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair that gets frizzy with the least bit of humidity. I was able to go all summer without frizz. I was able to go 3-4 days between washings. Best gel I have ever used and I have tried a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mangrum

customer_reviews.title: Great product for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Withstands summer heat and rain and with confused curly hair it works like a gem. This product is meant for curly hair. You only need a small amount because it goes a long way. It’s a tad bit expensive but totally worth it
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.text: I still experience frizz but this is still the best I've found. Also, I live in Florida. I've recently decided instead of buying sprays to use between washes to revitalize my curls, I'm now just mixing this gel with water and spraying that on. After I wash my hair I mix it with some leave-in conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Rei

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product
customer_reviews.text: If you have curly hair and live in high humidity area this is by far the best product. I have tried everything under the sun and finally found product that works for me. It defines curls but does not feel like you put tons of stuff that will weight your hair down or make your hair feel stiff and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Huge waste of money. Makes my curls tangle and super frizzy, crunchy in some areas but overall really bad for my hair, I am 3B curl type. Very disappointed no matter how much product I put and no matter if I mixed with other curls products doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Lee

customer_reviews.title: Humidity eventually penetrates and you're frizzy
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a good hair gel, but it's hold up again humidity didn't last on 3c/4a hair in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: xenatcor3

customer_reviews.title: Tames frizz
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years to help tame my curly and frizzy hair. It works well-my hair still curls in humidity but doesn't get frizzy. I have tried many, many hair products and this one works the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Louise E. Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my routine
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this gel since last July and haven’t looked back. Though it’s a little pricey, I usually mix it with s little bit of LA Looks and I’m able to make it last for a few months which is great. Does great with curl definition along with controlling frizz due to humidity control. My hair is very dry so my frizz is never 100% cured but I blame that on my unruly mane.
customer_reviews.author: Chel C

customer_reviews.title: Creates a beautiful curl
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best product I have ever used for my fussy curls. It’s helps shape my mildly curly hair. Also creates nice shape for my kids hair both of which is more like a sparingly curl.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Helps Manage the Frizz
customer_reviews.text: This is a leave-in product that helps control curly hair frizz on damp or rainy days. It is an easy to use gel. It is sulfate and paraben-free and does not leave the hair stiff. At this price (over $3/oz), I’m looking for a less expensive humidity control product.
customer_reviews.author: sparkleplenty

customer_reviews.title: OK for humidity control, not a curl cream
customer_reviews.text: This works ok for controlling humidity, but not so great as a curl defining cream, which is what you expect from Ouidad. Was rather disappointed. Using just this product, my curly hair still ended up frizzy. If I mix it with a bit of Bumble & Bumble Curl Cream, works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair feel dirty and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product because of the good reviews. Unfortunately I did not like this product @ all. I have curly to wavy hair. It left my hair heavy and lifeless with a clammy feeling to the touch. I’ve used $3.00 products that work 100% better. For me I will not buy again an it’ll sit in my cabinet of many unused curly hair products that simply don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Amazingness
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this gel!!! A little goes a long way which is awesome because it lasts through a whole family using it. Makes curls so pretty and soft!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curl Perfection
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this curly hair product. I use a quarter size dollop in wet hair and I get lovely, soft, bouncy curls. This gel is not sticky. Does not make my hair frizzy. I can dampen with water the next day and put life back into curls without any frizz or flop. I am an huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: M Esselman

customer_reviews.title: Does wonders, requires a large amount of product
customer_reviews.text: Really quite wonderful Only wish it required a bit less product Ridiculously thick and curly hair, I may get 6 uses from the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Fyreflowyr

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. Doesnt make it crunchy and makes ur hair look shiny and definitely makes it frizz free for them summer days with humidity! In love! I get so many compliments on my hair when I use this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: This product is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use while in Florida and I must say it didn't disappoint, which the temps were 98 degrees with 100% humidity. I love the way this product makes my hair feel, shiny, soft with no build up not to mention defining the waves, which my hair is wavy and not curly. I will purchase this product again which I've put down the curling iron for the summer and going natural. Doesn't weigh your hair down either.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: It works. It is Light. It lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 3 year. I have short hair and a use about a nickel size dose. I love that it is light and how it beautifully defines my curls. A bottle lasts me a year.
customer_reviews.author: aucelegre

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about that this product dries out hair and after using it for about six weeks now I have to agree it did have my hair feeling very dry and weird texture. After spending so much money for a small bottle I was hoping results. I won’t be buying again. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sh1r33na

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this since I live in a hot, humid climate. Hold was fine but my hair was at least as frizzy, if not more, with this $26 gel as with the $3 drugstore-brand gels I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: TeamMed

customer_reviews.title: Like not love
customer_reviews.text: I really don't see any difference between this product and others. The only real difference is this is more expensive. I have curly hair and finding the right product is always a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for heat and humidity
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t have as lunch staying power as I recall in the past but it does a great job of managing frizz control. I also use the related shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnymat

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as good as some people say. It works as almost any gel for curly hair, so if I knew it, I would have picked a cheaper option. My hair curls are not very tight, they tend to get more wavy, and this product did not work very well on them.
customer_reviews.author: Diogo Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Finally frizz free
customer_reviews.text: This gel is the best thing that’s ever happened to my hair. I used to always get frizz shortly after or sometimes while diffusing, not anymore. My hair is curlier than ever before, but still soft and bouncy. Not to mention I got four days of great hair with no refreshing, a first for me. This stuff is magical. I have looser waves/curls and med to high porosity strands that tend to lose moisture fast. That’s why I love that this product does not contain glycerin. So far I’ve paired with curls blueberry bliss leave in or kinky curly knot today, and it pairs well with both.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Thin Light Weight Oil, Good for 1A- 3A curls
customer_reviews.text: I have really tight curly hair that’s also thin (maybe 3C) and I’m not impressed with this product at all. It did nothing for my curls. I’m giving it a 3 stars because when mixed with other products it did reduce frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Amil B.

customer_reviews.title: Works for some hair types!
customer_reviews.text: Good for some types of hair but not my fine natural curly color treated! I gave it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Chapman

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product for curly hair. Only use when hair is very wet!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka English

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: Great product ..! I have very curly hair so it’s hard to find something to bind the curls without weighing it down. It’s best used after washing while Hair is still wet, use small amount best with diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: juana pascubello

customer_reviews.title: Works great on curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. She was very happy to recieve it.
customer_reviews.author: Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters frizzy curly hair. The best product we have ever bought. Only need a dime sized drop. Lasts about 6 months. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this so much but unfortunately it did nothing to keep my curls together or control frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Janee Lorraine Call

customer_reviews.title: Yay no frizz!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I live in a very humid area and my curls look so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great For Frizz Curls
customer_reviews.text: I use this product while my hair is wet in the shower. I do apply a couple other products once I am out. But, this is the best product to date after 100s of trials that helps reduce the frizz and allows my ethnic curls to bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold curls - doesn’t block humidity - more hair breakage
customer_reviews.text: Really had hopes for this product. But super dissatisfied. I used it in combination with the QuiDad Humidity products and it doesn’t hold well at all. Hair was very frizzy, not soft more hard and dry feeling even after defusing it. Gave it a total of 3 tries with the Whip product and they just don’t hold the curls at all - by night time the curls are a hot mess like you slept on them. I have very thin curly mixed hair and it also caused a lot of breakage and I lost a bit more hair then normal with the product. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Burnsed

customer_reviews.title: Takes the frizz out.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My hair is very frizzy when it is humid and when I combine this with a leave in conditioner- no worries. It isn't crunchy like some products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love but just can’t. Does not do well in 2c-3a long hair. Too expensive to not work like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stiffness
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. It's so hot and humid here, I'm not convinced anything works 100%. I like this better than a foam which seems to make my hair stiff.
customer_reviews.author: justwrite

customer_reviews.title: Great gel for
customer_reviews.text: Great gel! Gives my curls hold without being stiff, sticky, or looking wet. Doesn’t weigh my fine hair down either. The gel I’d been using for years was discontinued, and I was dreading trying to find a suitable replacement. I’m thrilled that this gel is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Schettino

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: It works well, pleasant light fragrance, does not feel sticky or stiff. Only negative is the price, thus reduced by 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Not much frizz control
customer_reviews.text: Product is not what I expected. I bought this after receiving a sample from another website and it doesn’t hold the same as the sample. It doesn’t control frizz as well either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Curl Control
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My daughter wears her hair natural and after her leave-in we couldn’t live without the control this provides. A little goes a long way and we have really thick hair. Use a diffuser and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Shortie0212

customer_reviews.title: The only gel I will use.
customer_reviews.text: This gel is not “crunchy” or drying. Holds my hair very well without giving it the “wet” look.
customer_reviews.author: LReed

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than Deva Curl. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Fireman

customer_reviews.title: Great product holds adds shine and holds curl definition
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best gel I have ever used. Every other gel I used made my hair supper dry and thick. This gel hold my curl and define it. I use this gel with love your curls all in one styling product and I am always getting compliments on how defined my curls are and how healthy they look.
customer_reviews.author: Chris correia

customer_reviews.title: One of my happiest purchases.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have super frizzy hair and this helps to take the frizz and define my curls!
customer_reviews.author: Jackijack

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really does work! I have curly hair and live in Hawaii. Humidity is constant here and this stuff really does help very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Best Gel for Coarse/Curlies!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST lightweight, no -sticky hair gel for my coarse/curly hair. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking curls
customer_reviews.text: I’m IRISH, & I have thick curly long hair. This product makes my curls look great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Use generously.
customer_reviews.text: Inhances your curls. Gives great hold for the natural curly. Does what it says it’s suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: ErotikaJ

customer_reviews.title: no more frizz
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous products for my naturally curly hair and as of today, this tops my list. Leaves my hair shiny and no frizz. Follow directions and bravo, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Did not like at all
customer_reviews.text: This made my curls lifeless and stingy. Was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A.schlup

customer_reviews.title: Good Hold But Pricey
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this product gives my hair hold but not how after a couple of days it leaves little white flake residue in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair and have tried many products, but none can match up to Climate Control by Ouidad. This stuff is the best to keep curls moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Trish Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought after reading such great reviews This product did absolutely nothing for my frizz or curls. Don't waste you time or money. Went back to my $8 product that does help.
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after using the product while visiting my sister. I’m not sure if it is authentic OUIDAD because the product does absolutely nothing for my hair. It’s as if I have nothing on my hair at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well in Florida Humidity
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for quite some time. In Florida, with all of its humidity, this product helps keep the frizzies down.
customer_reviews.author: kynamiller

customer_reviews.title: Ouidad hair gek
customer_reviews.text: I have heard so much about this product and decided to try it. I live in Virginia where humidity is high and ruins my curls. I hope it works!
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Sparrer

customer_reviews.title: Ouidad for the win
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ouidad line of products. Leaves my hair feeling much cleaner and less weighed down than the other major line of curly hair products that I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, dry's your hair into brittle mess
customer_reviews.text: This product was the worst and like someone else on here said, it made my hair worse. So dry and brittle. Just horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyed Italian

customer_reviews.title: Great for humidity
customer_reviews.text: This was great with the combination of the style cream. Walked out in a weak tropical storm today in south Florida and my hair still looks good. Leaves soft, manageable curls
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Silky
customer_reviews.text: Love this gel! Not sticky. Nice definition without harsh gold.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Curly heads love this!
customer_reviews.text: New user of this product and I absolutely love it! Buying again and last pretty long if used right!
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: My thick curly hair looks much better now in humidity.
customer_reviews.author: ConradColeridge

customer_reviews.title: Curls Poppin
customer_reviews.text: Since moving back to Kentucky my curls have struggled.... My coworker gave me a sample bottle of this product and I had to have it! I use it along with a leave in conditioner and defuser... My curls look and feel so hydrated healthy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the hold is great without feeling stiff or sticky
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product over 10 years. Recently my son started "borrowing" it. the hold is great without feeling stiff or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. This did not make my hair frizz free. I really wanted to like this but it just did not work in my hair at all. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Liked the original better
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok but much more crunchy and wet looking then the previous product.
customer_reviews.author: K Way

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing for my naturally curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Needs careful packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, unfortunately it came with the gel leaking in the container :-( I lost some product in the process.
customer_reviews.author: SharkFIn

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT CONTROL FRIZZ ON THIN CURLY HAIR !
customer_reviews.text: Awful.....have used the Ouidad Climate control gel for years.....worked great. This new product makes my thin, curly hair frizzy, no matter how much product I use. Trying to find the old product to buy....otherwise I'm done using this....will find another brand...SO DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Alice R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Florida Keys. I have long naturally curly hair. This product is great! I use it with Marc Anthony curl lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Helped manage my frizz and emphasize my curls. Leave in until cast is set and then scrunch!
customer_reviews.author: Redheadwriter

customer_reviews.title: Not enough protection for humidity
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to other reviews. Didn't work. Went to tresemme mousse. Better! My hair just frizzled in North Carolina summer
customer_reviews.author: Old dog groomer

product_meta.title: Ouidad Advanced Climate Control Heat and Humidity Gel, 8.5 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
Humidity: It's every curl's nightmare. That's because curly hair's unique structure exposes its cuticle. When humidity gets in, curls expand with unwanted volume and look frizzy, undefined, and dull. Use Advanced Climate Control Heat & Humidity Gel to seal every strand, lock in moisture, and lock out humidity. Wheat Protein and pliable styling polymers form a weightless flexible lattice that expands as heat or humidity rises to hold curl definition without frizz. This high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with a protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to keep essential moisture in and humidity out. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. The result: Flexible hold that won't leave hair crunchy, sticky, or weighed down. Frizz-free, perfectly defined curls-in any climateDivide damp hair into sections. Rake a nickel-size amount of gel through each section, using fingertips to seal and smooth the cuticle from roots to ends. When finished, hold the ends of hair in each section and shake to create curls. Let hair air-dry or blow-dry with a diffuser.

Ingredients:

Aqua (Water), Butylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-28, Sericin, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Extract, Wheat Amino Acids, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein/PVP Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-7, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, PEG-60 Almond Glycerides Glycerin, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool. DG-033-134-01



BRAND STORY
Ouidad is the original curl expert with one iconic idea — let curls be curls. For over 30 years, we’ve perfected a unique customized approach for each curl type: Loose, Classic, Tight, and Kinky curls.

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
